attributes.action: To push for road bridges to be built in west cumbria (WORKINGTON ETC.)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The county council are waiting to see the status of WORKINGTON BRIDGE (calva bridge) before they make their mind up.It will take months for the river to be down to winter flood leval as the 6 lakes have back-upped the water.
I LIVE NEAR THE SHOPPING CENTER AND IT STILL TAKES ME MILES TO GO TO THE NORT SIDE OF TOWN.I HAVE WALKING DIFFICULTIES AND CAN NOT WALK TO THE RAILWAY STATION LET ALONE TO THE "NEW FOOT BRIDGE" . I HAVE TO DRIVE NEARLY 20 MILES TO THE NORTH SIDE OF TOWN A HALF MILE AWAY, SO I AM MISSING SOME FRIENDS.!!!
Please can we have a temp. brige for transport right away.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
